Pre-Game Insights: India have the least chance of getting knocked out among the four teams. With a positive NRR of 2.425, a win against Australia will confirm their spot in the semis.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India vs Australia, St. Lucia – June 24th 2024, 8.00 PM IST
Afghanistan vs Bangladesh, St Vincent – June 25th 2024, 6.00 AM IST
Others: India will only get knocked out if…- Australia beat India by 35-40 runs or chase the target in 14-16 overs, which would take Australia's NRR over India
Bangladesh have a very slim chance of qualification
